Form Validator

About this project

This is a Form Validator in JavaScript implementing some client-side form validations. It will check if any fields are missing, the minimum and maximum length limitations are fulfilled, and if the two passwords entered are matching. Also, when the form of the text entered as an email address is not right, it will show an error message.
